entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
